titles: Godfrey of Bulloigne, or The recouerie of Hierusalem An heroicall poeme written in Italian by Seig. Torquato Tasso, and translated into English by R.C. Esquire: and now the first part containing fiue cantos, imprinted in both languages.
Gerusalemme liberata. Book 1-5. English and Italian
author: Tasso, Torquato, 1544-1595.
Carew, Richard, 1555-1620.
publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Windet for Thomas Man dwelling in Pater noster-Row,
notes: A translation, by Richard Carew, of books 1-5 of: Gerusalemme liberata.
Italian and English texts on facing pages.
A variant of the edition with imprint dated 1594 and giving Christopher Hunt as publisher.
